subject: Transform Hair Time into Bonding Moments!
preview: Discover how to make hair brushing a joyful experience for your family.
hero_subtitle: Limited Time: Enjoy 20% off your first purchase!
descriptive_block_subtitle: Make hair care a joyful experience together.
descriptive_block_content: We know how challenging hair time can be, and we're here to help you make it joyful! With PopBrush, painless detangling transforms hair brushing into a positive experience for the whole family. No more tears or tantrums, just happy moments filled with laughter and bonding. Imagine sharing these precious times with your children, making hair care a cherished routine.
product_block_subtitle: Innovative brushes designed for all hair types and ages.
products: Haircare accessories (cleaning combs, keratin detangling treatments, decorative items)

subject: Transform Hair Time: Discover Your Perfect PopBrush!
preview: Say goodbye to tangles and hello to effortless brushing!
hero_subtitle: Limited Time Offer: Take our quiz to find your perfect PopBrush and enjoy a special discount!
descriptive_block_subtitle: Experience the joy of effortless brushing.
descriptive_block_content: With PopBrush, you will turn frustrating hair-brushing battles into peaceful parenting victories. Our innovative detangling brushes work effectively on all hair types, minimizing damage while promoting healthy hair. We want you to enjoy every moment of brushing your hair! Make hair brushing a joyful experience for your family today.
product_block_subtitle: Discover how PopBrush can work for your unique hair type.
products: Haircare accessories (cleaning combs, keratin detangling treatments, decorative items)
